PERSONA:
meet sarah, a 25-year-old white woman from a non-metropolitan area in the pacific region of the west. she recently graduated from college with a bachelor's degree and is exploring her career options. 

sarah was born and raised in the united states by her protestant family, and she attends religious services once a week. her strong faith and conservative values have shaped her political views, leading her to align with the republican party and identify as a conservative.

coming from an upper-income household with an annual income between $60,000 and $70,000, sarah has had the privilege of a comfortable upbringing. she is a registered voter and takes her civic duties seriously.

in her free time, sarah enjoys spending time outdoors and exploring the natural beauty of the pacific region. she is an avid user of the internet, frequently browsing online several times a day to stay connected and informed.

while sarah has not been involved in volunteering activities so far, she is open to exploring opportunities that align with her values and interests. overall, sarah is a driven and principled young woman who is navigating her post-college life while staying true to her roots and beliefs.
